alert.note: Alert for Gratiot (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 10:34AM EDT until April 05 at 11:15AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gratiot County in central Michigan... * Until 1115 AM EDT. * At 1033 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Edmore to near Ionia, moving east at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alma... Ithaca... St. Louis... Breckenridge... Wheeler... Sumner... North Star... Ashley... Perrinton... Elm Hall... Gratiot Community Ai... Bannister... Forest Hill... Pompeii... Riverdale... Middleton... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for central Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for central Michigan.
